sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { VisibilityService } from 'src/app/services/visibility.service'; // Assurez-vous que le chemin est correct @Component({ selector: 'app-accueil', templateUrl: './accueil.component.html', styleUrls: ['./accueil.component.css'] }) export class AccueilComponent { isBannerVisible: boolean = false; constructor(private visibilityService: VisibilityService) { // Abonnement Ã  la visibilitÃ© du banner this.visibilityService.isVisible$.subscribe((visibility) => { this.isBannerVisible = visibility; }); } // MÃ©thode pour basculer la visibilitÃ© toggleBannerVisibility() { this.visibilityService.toggleVisibility(); } }
